column2: University of the West of England, Bristol
column3: Department of Computer Science and Creative Technologies
column5: The MSc Information Technology prepares you for the intellectual, analytical and practical challenges of a career in IT. You will develop the knowledge and skills necessary to collate information, define, design and build or select the most appropriate IT solutions and develop a deeper understanding of how those solutions apply to professional contexts.You can study part-time whilst in full-time employment, as there are few pre-requisites for most modules.The tools to take you to the next

column9: 1 year full-time, 2 years part-time (Sept start) 1 year full time (Jan start)
